quotes.quote: If cheerleaders are so easy, why aren't you with one?
There are two types of people in this world, cheerleaders, and those who wish they were.
Football players throw a 3 pound ball in the air, but cheerleaders throw a 100 pound girl in the air and catch her.
It takes a little more to make a champion, but it takes a lot more to make a cheerleader.
If football/basketball is so awesome, why does it take cheerleaders to excite the crowd?
There is no halftime for cheerleaders.
Simply because we do not run across goal lines, slam dunk basketballs, or hit home runs, doesn't mean we can't change the score.
Cheerleaders know that pyramids were not built in Egypt.
Cheerleaders rock cause we know how to roll.
A good cheerleader is not measured by the height of her jumps but by the span of her spirit.
Flying is the second best thrill to cheerleaders; being caught is the first.
You know you're a cheerleader when you have to kick, yell and scream to get what you want.
Wimps lift Weights, Cheerleaders lift People.
Cheerleaders are simply a jump above the rest.
It's hard to be humble when you can jump, stunt, and tumble!
Sportsmanship starts and ends with the cheerleader.
A cheerleader is a dreamer that never gives up.
Cheerleaders are angels - we're the only humans who can fly.
